apple_vendor_description: This emoji on Apple devices beautifully illustrates a loving relationship between two women, one with a light skin tone and the other with a medium-light skin tone, embraced by a prominent heart. Apple's design language imbues the figures with warmth through its signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting, giving them a gentle, rounded appearance. It is a powerful symbol of same-sex love, partnership, and romantic connection.
